name: Eve
greetingText: I like your name by the way! Even if you refused to tell me your Luo name
text1: It is your Birthday by the way!
textInChatBox: Happy Birthday to you! Happy bithday dear...
text2: This is what I was to say to you.
text3: But because of the distance between us.
text4: I want to say it in a
wishText: PS: Happy Birthday Jaber as you turn a year older. You refused to tell me your age, but I know you will tell me in due course. KEEP SMILING!.
outroText: I wanted you to send me your best picture so that I can have it here, but you didn't. I had to improvise
replayText: Tap here to watch it again.
